skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Buccocast is the destination for quality Pittsburgh Pirates analysis and interviews. With each episode, Jason Rollison of Bucs Dugout brings you an informative 20 minutes of Pirates talk straight to your ears.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
